bug.author: sirtris
bug.description:
Weights and Biases version: 0.8.17 Python version: 3.7.1 Operating System: Linux-5.2.9-arch1-1-ARCH-x86_64-with-debian-buster-sid
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Sweep stops without interuption: <denchmark-code>2019-12-04 12:48:10,473 - wandb.wandb_agent - INFO - Running runs: ['oe72ewxg'] 2019-12-04 12:48:10,657 - wandb.wandb_agent - INFO - Agent received command: stop 2019-12-04 12:48:10,657 - wandb.wandb_agent - INFO - Stop: oe72ewxg </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
When I run a sweep it runs for one to three sweeps and the stops with the message above. I did not stop the runs in the webapp. Sweeps are started with: <denchmark-code>sweep_id = wandb.sweep(sweep_config, entity="MY_ENTITY_NAME", project="MY_PROJECT_NAME") wandb.agent(sweep_id, function=train) </denchmark-code>
In the train function I have a sweep_config dict.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.62. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Can you post your sweep or run url? if you want to keep that private, you can direct message me at: <denchmark-link:http://bit.ly/wandb-forum>http://bit.ly/wandb-forum</denchmark-link>

It looks like the python sweep api is not working with early_terminate/hyperband, for now the workarounds are one of the following:
use the sweep command line (wandb sweep sweep.yaml, wandb agent SWEEP_ID) disable early_terminate from the sweep yaml for now
Early terminate was fixed with the python agent api. Marking this closed.
